scripts.setup-yarn: yarn config set nodeLinker node-modules && yarn plugin import workspace-tools
scripts.check: yarn run build-common && yarn workspaces foreach run check
scripts.package: yarn run build-common && yarn run package-gh-action && yarn run package-docker
scripts.start-gh-action: yarn run build-common && yarn run package-gh-action && yarn workspace '@gatling-enterprise-runner/gh-action' run start
scripts.start-docker: yarn run build-common && yarn run package-docker && yarn workspace '@gatling-enterprise-runner/docker' run start
